description:
Yuki successfully finishes the recording of her debut single, "White Album."  Meanwhile, Misaki is staying at Touya`s father`s house, as the two of them work to make the props and clothes.
The next day, Touya visits the Mizuki household for his tutor job, where he was previously sent away before even coming inside.
There he meets the girl he saw on the day of his date with Yuki, Mana.
Mana surprises him by easily clearing all the problems he gives her.
On his way back, he finds that Misaki has come to the station to meet him.  The two of them stop at Echoes to have dinner, and during their meal, Rina drops by...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mental Image Is Something That Needs Constant Building Up. It Crumbles Easily.
Image wa Dondon Kouchiku Shinakya. Tada de sae, Hashi kara Kuzureteku Mono nandakara
イメージはどんどん構築しなきゃ. ただでさえ, 端から崩れてくものなんだから
